title: Add Instagram promo link for KK Euro Express videos

requirements.text: Update the Home page media section (frontend/src/components/site/VideoSection.tsx) to promote the Instagram account `kkeuroexpress_banga` by changing the section copy to “Watch our videos on Instagram” (English) and adding a clear outbound link/button that opens the Instagram profile at `https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga` in a new tab.

quotes: ok now you update watch our videos on instagram kkeuroexpress_banga ok

acceptanceCriteria: The VideoSection heading references Instagram videos in English (e.g., “Watch our videos on Instagram”).
The VideoSection includes a visible link/button that navigates to https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga.
The Instagram link opens in a new tab and uses rel="noopener noreferrer".
The existing video embed and fallback image behavior remain unchanged (video still attempts to load; fallback image still appears on error).

requirements.text: Add an Instagram link in the site footer (frontend/src/components/site/SiteFooter.tsx) that points to `https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga` and clearly labels the handle in English (e.g., “Instagram: @kkeuroexpress_banga”).

quotes: ok now you update watch our videos on instagram kkeuroexpress_banga ok

acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays an Instagram link labeled in English and referencing @kkeuroexpress_banga.
Clicking the footer Instagram link opens https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
No existing footer contact details (email/phone/24/7) are removed or changed.

constraints: Frontend files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT must not be edited.
Do not add new routes or change existing navigation structure for this update.
nonGoals: Embedding an Instagram feed or calling Instagram APIs.
Changing backend Motoko code or data models.
Changing the existing video asset paths or fallback image paths.
